org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization

Class AbstractBinarySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization.AbstractSerializer
      • org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization.AbstractBinarySerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessagePackSerializer.Mixin

    public abstract class AbstractBinarySerializer
extends AbstractSerializer
    Base Binary Serializer. Implementations work on bytes, this base serializer encode these bytes in Base64 to produce Strings. See AbstractBinaryDeserializer.
